info.name: Santa meets Bugzilla
info.additionalInfo:
Ho ho ho!
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?component=WebExtensions&product=Toolkit&bug_status=__all__

Sometimes the dinosaur (an animated GIF) and the sleigh (a CSS animation) are out of sync. I don't know why.

Also, Chrome isn't showing me the dinosaur, only a blank page, so maybe this is Firefox-only.
